EXTRACTED VALUE: Basically, only play Ratatouille if you're the most hardcore fan of the movie, and you just adore rat platforming action.
A deeply unsatisfying experience, although younger players may have some fun just running around as Mike and laughing at his crazy antics.
The dull, repetitive gameplay is what hurts it the most, leaving some merely average visuals to pick up the pieces.
RFS's gameplay is completely off the wall fun, and despite its quirky premise, kept me coming back for more time and time again.
Sneak King isn't a good game, but it's so crazy and so cheap that it still manages to be weirdly compelling.
A good idea, but the gameplay, graphics, and controls make this game come up short.
I didn't feel that there was anything terribly new or revolutionary about the game, but it was undeniably fun to play.
